content: into left over chs from leaf 3 2 slip_stitch stem 2 chain 25 starting in 2nd from hook 3sc in next 23 chs slip_stitch hanging loop chain 20 slip_stitch to first chain slip_stitch to 2nd to last chain of leaf 2 to make everything form a small circle see photo below fasten_off leaving long tail assembly sew the connecting circle to top of wreath very securely your stem will cover up the green circle tip try to wrap your tail around the actual foam core for extra strength stem with brown row 1 chain 10 starting in 2nd chain from hook 9 half_double_crochet chain 1 turn r2-10 in blo half_double_crochet in each st chain 1 turn r11 in blo slip_stitch row 10 to row 1 fasten_off leaving long tail assembly with tail weave through side a edge pull tight to cinch closed add fiber fill to stem with tail weave through side b edge pull tight to cinch closed with remaining tail sew on top of stem s green circle designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade double_crochet chain 31 starting in 2nd chain from hook 30 slip_stitch slip_stitch into top of double_crochet chain 5 skip chain-space *double_crochet chain 11 skip chain-space double_crochet chain 5 skip chain-space double_crochet chain 5 skip chain-space* 6 times join fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing assembly sew to back of circle with the dangly bits hanging at the bottom tip pin in place to know how much you need to stretch the web if using a different sized ring simply omit some rounds first photo below shows the back of the wreath designed by crochet by those_yellow_things
